name: Guerre et Paix
description:
WINDOWS BUILD RECOMMENDED!

Controls: WASD / Spacebar to move, C to use ability

Guerre et Paix is a Platformer about war and peace made during the Bear Jams Fall 2022. You play as a Robot in a distant future and you are tasked to decorate the Park to celebrate peace as a war is about to end.

Game made in Unity.

RavaTroll's comments :

The sprite use the juice56 palette, and all the pixel art was made by RavaTroll from scratch.

The Music was made using Image Line's FL Studio, Plogue's Chipsounds, Klevgrand's Pana and Røverb,  Waves Factory's Trackspacer, D-16 Audio Punchbox, and various stock FL plugins.

All the music features three polyphonic chiptune synths, a noise channel and a kick.

Both level themes use the same harmonic and melodic structure but are still written in two different styles. The main menu and cutscene themes are quite identical and the final music is very similar to the level theme.

You can listen to the music on my Soundcloud if you want to.

https://soundcloud.com/ravatroll/sets/guerre-et-paix-soundtrack
